title: Unranked in Ranked
body: Hey , I wondered what will happen if I have played a few games in Flex 5v5 but I'm still unranked and the season ends. Will the wins and loses save for the next year or it will start clear like I have _**never**_ played Flex before?

replies.body: Unlikely!  Traditionally, each season requires playing a new set of placement games.  If you don't finish ranked, you would still need to play 10 placement games in the next season.
